{"step_by_step_thinking": "ZOE impression paste is a type of dental material used for making impressions of teeth and oral tissues. It is composed of zinc oxide and eugenol. The eugenol acts as a retarder, slowing down the setting time of the paste. Therefore, the accelerator component in ZOE impression paste must be zinc sulphate. Glycerin is not typically used as an accelerator in ZOE impression paste.", "answer_choice": "A. Zinc Sulphate & Zinc chloride"}
